text: aur yah bhee usakee nishaaniyon mein se hai ki usane tumhaaree hee sahajaati se tumhaare lie jode paida kie, taaki tum usake paas shaanti praapt karo. aur usane tumhaare beech premm aur dayaaluta paida kee. aur nishchay hee isamen bahut-see nishaaniyaan hai un logon ke lie jo soch-vichaar karate hai
